QuestData.Title: The Captured Druid
QuestData.Description: It's fallen to some of our youngest to defend our camp, $n, and many of our bravest apprentices are out there as we speak, fighting the quilboar. I fear for their safety...$B$BPlease, look for the young druid Keshu Treehoof to the east, deep within quilboar territory. If you find her and the other apprentices alive, they may be able to help you.
